semantics.label: Show title screen
semantics.description: If checked, a title screen will show up when starting.

fields.label: Introduction for filtering and selection
fields.description: Explain what the users are expected to do when filtering and selecting content.

fields.label: Introduction for reordering
fields.description: Explain what the users are expected to do reordering content.

fields.label: Introduction for viewing
fields.description: Explain what the users are expected to do when viewing content.

fields.label: Label
fields.description: Label for the content. The label will be set to the metadata title if no label, image or teaser is set.

fields.label: Paveiksliukas
fields.description: Optional illustrative image.

fields.label: Teaser
fields.description: Optional teaser for the content.

fields.label: Keywords
fields.description: Enter keywords for the content each separated by a comma (,).

fields.label: Turinys
fields.description: Pasirinkite norimo pridėti turinio tipą.

fields.label: Kortelės plotis
fields.description: Set the default card width as a CSS value (e.g. 100px or 14rem or 15em). If you leave out the unit, px will be assumed.

fields.label: Image sizing
fields.description: Pasirinkite, kokio dydžio turinio paveiksliukai turėtų būti.

fields.label: Custom ratio width
fields.description: Set the horizontal ratio component for content images.

fields.label: Custom ratio height
fields.description: Set the vertical ratio component for content images.
Set the maximum number of lines to display for the content teaser.
fields.label: Maximum teaser lines
Start with everything
fields.description: Choose whether all contents should be selected by default ready to be used.

fields.label: Preselect all keywords
fields.description: Choose whether all or no keywords should be selected when starting the content.

fields.label: Bind selection to tags
fields.description: Choose whether the cards should be automatically selected/deselected when a tag is selected/deselected.

fields.label: Start
fields.description: Label of start button.

fields.label: Selected
fields.description: Status label of selected content.

fields.label: Status: unstarted
fields.description: Status label for unstarted content.

fields.label: Status: viewed
fields.description: Status label for viewed content.

fields.label: Status: completed
fields.description: Status label for completed content.

fields.label: Status: cleared
fields.description: Status label for cleared content.

fields.label: No cards to show
fields.description: Message when no content matches any of the chosen keywords.
fields.default: You need to select keywords in order to see contents to select from.

fields.label: No cards were selected
fields.description: Message when no contents were selected.
fields.default: You have not selected any contents.

fields.label: Untitled Content
fields.description: Fallback label.

fields.label: Reset confirmation dialog: header
fields.description: Header for dialog to confirm resetting all contents.

fields.label: Reset confirmation dialog: text
fields.description: Text for dialog to confirm resetting all contents.
fields.default: All your contents and their status will be reset, but your selection will remain as is. Do you want to proceed?

fields.label: Reset confirmation dialog: header
fields.description: Header for dialog to confirm resetting all contents and selections.

fields.label: Reset confirmation dialog: text
fields.description: Text for dialog to confirm resetting all contents and selections.
fields.default: All your contents and their status and your selections will be reset. Do you want to proceed?

fields.label: Exercise description
fields.description: @label is a placeholder that will be replaced with the respective value.

fields.label: Toolbar description
fields.default: Toolbar. Use the key combination Alt plus T to focus the toolbar later on.

fields.label: Tag selector
fields.default: Tag selector. Use to filter exercises.

fields.label: Description for content list: Select mode
fields.default: Select all exercises that you want to work on

fields.label: Description for content list: Reorder mode
Description for content list: View mode

fields.description: @position1 and ¹position2 are placeholders and will be replaced with the respective values.
fields.default: Swapped content at position @position1 with content at position @position2.
fields.label: Swapped contents
